channel.title: Music – Marmalade
channel.description: Recent content in Marmalade on Music

item.title: Marmalade - Reflections Of My Life
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Thomas McAleese, William Campbell
KY: 8630 / KY: 20563

The changing
of sunlight
To moonlight
reflections of my life
Oh how they fill
my eyes
The greetings
of people in trouble
Reflections
of my life
Oh how they fill
my eyes
All my sorrow
sad tomorrow
Oh take me back
to my old home
All my crying
feel I’m dying dying
Take me back
to my old home-

I’m changing arranging
I’m changing
I’m changing
ev’rything
Oh ev’rything
around me
The world is
a bad place
A bad place
a terrible place
To live oh but
I don’t want to die
All my sorrow
sad tomorrow
Oh take me back
to my old home
All my crying
feel I’m dying dying
Take me back
to my old home
All my sorrow
sad tomorrow
Oh take me back
to my old home-
